comments: Terms are even or 1: range = A004275. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 26 2011]
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := Count[ Table[ If[ SquareFreeQ[j] && GCD[j, n] == 1, If[k = n-j; SquareFreeQ[k] && GCD[k, n] == 1, 1]], {j, 1, n-1}], 1]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 64}](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 28 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a007457 n = length [k | k <- [1..n-1], gcd k n == 1, a008966 k == 1,                        let j = n - k, gcd j n == 1, a008966 j == 1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 26 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
